short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper extension for Mailpass secure email alias platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a companion extension to the Mailpass.io platform. 
Using this extension is the fastest and most secure way to sign up for services, right from the site or tab you are currently using.
